mapper.select: SELECT board_id AS boardId, board_title AS boardTitle, board_content AS boardContent, category, img_url AS imgUrl, user_id AS userId, board_created_at AS boardCreatedAt, board_view AS boardView FROM tbl_boards WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_boards (board_title, board_content, category, img_url, user_id, board_created_at, board_view) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{category}, #{imgUrl}, #{userId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_boards SET board_view = #{view} WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
